parameters.content:
üìß EMAIL AUTOMATION SEQUENCE

1. Welcome Email (Immediate)
2. Setup Guide (5 minutes later)
3. Motivation Email (1 day later)

Each email is personalized with user data and contains specific CTAs to drive engagement.

üîß SETUP REQUIREMENTS

1. Replace YOUR_GOOGLE_SHEETS_ID with actual sheet ID
2. Replace YOUR_GMAIL_CREDENTIAL_ID with actual credential ID
3. Replace YOUR_GOOGLE_SHEETS_CREDENTIAL_ID with actual credential ID
4. Test webhook URL: https://your-n8n-instance.com/webhook/email-signup
